thread.title: wonderful hotel in Rome
thread.title_full: wonderful hotel in Rome - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: mgoldin_12
title: wonderful hotel in Rome
text:
My husband and I currently stayed for 3 days at this hotel. It was lovely - great room and wonderful customer service. The front desk could not be nicer or more helpful. This is probably the best location in Rome. It is centrally located to everything. I can't wait to return.
Room Tip: ask for a room in the front for the best view See more room tips
